channel.title: Forgot which Email you signed with?
channel.description: Well, now that the possible rs2007 server is coming back, I was trying to log in. Apparantly, all the emails I know don't work for it. Is there any other way for me to recover my account.

item.title: Forgot which Email you signed with?
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:9, topic:488061”][quote author=I Love College link=topic=606296.msg4232848#msg4232848 date=1361393620]
You can trust it or not, I’m just answering his question. That’s not my problem if you don’t.
[/quote]Last time I checked, Jagex warned people constantly that they will only be contacted through the message center on the site and if the little hotmail bug still exists, you can easily make a fake e-mail @ jagex.com.[/quote]

You can’t create a @jagex.com email, but you can mask the senders email address using it e.g. send a email from 123@hotmail.com and the recipient will view it as admin@jagex.com

Read full topic
item.source: Forgot which Email you signed with?

[quote=“I Love College, post:8, topic:488061”]You can trust it or not, I’m just answering his question. That’s not my problem if you don’t.[/quote]Last time I checked, Jagex warned people constantly that they will only be contacted through the message center on the site and if the little hotmail bug still exists, you can easily make a fake e-mail @ jagex.com.

item.title: Forgot which Email you signed with?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“I Love College, post:6, topic:488061”]There actually is but they might not reply, you email I think it’s accounthelp@jagex.com or something along those lines an tell them you forgot the email your account is registered to, and the username of your account, (the original one if you’ve changed it) and
You could say a few recent passwords for the account but I’m not to sure if that will help, hope I helped

P.S. they don’t always email back, I’ve only gotten a few out of about 6 back trying to recover some of my old accounts[/quote]Hi. I’m an idiot, and this is my story.

Read full topic
item.source: Forgot which Email you signed with?

item.title: Forgot which Email you signed with?
item.dc:creator: @I_Love_College I Love College
item.description:
@I_Love_College wrote:

There actually is but they might not reply, you email I think it’s accounthelp@jagex.com or something along those lines an tell them you forgot the email your account is registered to, and the username of your account, (the original one if you’ve changed it) and
You could say a few recent passwords for the account but I’m not to sure if that will help, hope I helped

P.S. they don’t always email back, I’ve only gotten a few out of about 6 back trying to recover some of my old accounts

Read full topic
item.source: Forgot which Email you signed with?

item.title: Forgot which Email you signed with?
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Flame_:

When did you register the account? If you registered before 2011, you don’t use your e-mail to log in, but your original username.

It was made in 2006. I know, but I put my User and in the next page it asks for password.

Read full topic
